about.summary: Decorating PIL images: logos, texts, pallettes

name: pydecorate
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pydecorate" %}
{% set version = "0.2.1" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fa8bdcad3f721dbfa5aec2cff801a7b3d510af9c5d4cd0394970cd5362955ad8

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv "

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - pillow
    - aggdraw
    - numpy

test:
  imports:
    - pydecorate

about:
  home: https://github.com/pytroll/pydecorate
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: "Decorating PIL images: logos, texts, pallettes"
  doc_url: https://pydecorate.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/pytroll/pydecorate

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - djhoese
    - mraspaud
    - pnuu
    - adybbroe
